amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new section stating that nothing in the Act or amendments made by the Act shall affect the Presidential memorandum titled "Memorandum on the Withdrawal of Certain Areas of the United States Outer Continental Shelf from Leasing Disposition".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Gaetz.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
